(szerszám beállítás)

t2 m d2 h19
t3 m d3 h19
yxz
t1

f300

(pi3b furatok)

m2 = sum(87.1,-3.5,-58,-1,-10)
print "m2: $m2"
b corners 12,$m2 size49,58 z2.8 c0.05 d2.5

b corners 5,30 size63,25 z2.8 c0.05 d3.5
b corners 22.5,8 size25,72 z2.8 c0.05 d3.5

b outline 12,$m2 size49,58 z2.8 c0.05 d2.5 jg-10 g2,0.5,0.7
